# File lib/bundler/source.rb, line 15
      def initialize(options = {})
        @options = options
        @remotes = (options["remotes"] || []).map { |r| normalize_uri(r) }
        @fetchers = {}
        @allow_remote = false
        @allow_cached = false

        @caches = [ Bundler.app_cache ] + Gem.path.map{ |p| File.expand_path("#{p}/cache") }
        @spec_fetch_map = {}
      end
